title.rendered: Warehouse Jobs in USA with Visa Sponsorship – APPLY NOW

content.rendered:
Warehouse jobs in USA with visa sponsorship is one high paying job in America. Most people do prefer them because you can easily apply and secure the job in no time. Also, warehouse jobs do not require you to have high qualifications.

Furthermore, working in a warehouse in the US, comes with a lot of benefit, like health insurance, pension and medical support. More so, most warehouse jobs give you the opportunity to work as a team and learn new skills. Also, there are numerous job vacancy you can find and as well choose from.

 

Warehouse Jobs in USA with Visa Sponsorship.

Amazon Delivery Station Warehouse Associate

Amazon HVH

Location – Deptford Township in New Jersey

Job Description

  • You will receive and prepare inventory for all delivery.
  • Make use of technology like smartphones. Also, using handheld devices to sort, scan, and prepare multiple orders.
  • View prompts on computer screens and follow precise direction for some tasks.
  • You will build, wrap, sort, and as well transport pallets and packages
  • Also, you will receive truck deliveries
  • Ability to lift up to 49 pounds item
  • Furthermore, employee must walk, push, stand, pull, squat, and bend, during working shifts
  • Also, master the use of carts, dollies, and hand trucks. Employees need to gear to move items around
  • Ready to go up and down stairs if necessary
  • Lastly, work at a height of up to 40 feet on a mezzanine if necessary

Working Benefit.

  • Schedule work options
  • Flexible shifting time
  • Career Advancement
  • Anytime payment
  • New skills.
  • Competitive weekly wage payment. Therefore this includes overtime for more than 40 hours
  • Healthcare.
  • Medical Advice Line.
  • Network of Support.
  • Adoption Assistance.
  • Maternity and Parental Leave.
  • 401(k) savings plan for employees.
  • Paid Time Off (PTO).
  • Also, holiday pay opportunities.
  • Employee discounts.
  • Basic life insurance.
  • AD&D insurance.
  • Company-paid Short-Term and Long-Term Disability.
  • Job training and skills development.
  • All Employee Assistance Program.

Salary Est – $19.30 per hour

Estimated Salaries of Different Jobs in the USA.

Warehouse Associate – Mechdyne Corporation.

Location – Anaheim Canada.
Job Description: The employee will manage inventory levels with the operations manager.
Assemble the wall mate adapter when the need arise.
Create hardware kits for various available products.
Salary Est: $27,000 – $38,000 a year.
Harvest Picker
Location – Medford, OR
Salary Est – $17 per hour.
Employment type is seasonal.
>Job in Glassdoor.com.
Warehouse Worker.
Location – Woodburn, OR

Job Description.

  • Pick up orders by selecting various orders from the pickup list.
  • Operate manual forklifts and pick up and put pallets away. Also, docking them into reserve slot.
  • Receiving products and making sure they are checking out properly and counted.
  • Able to account for all products that is assigned to every load.
  • Ensure to apply all safety measures according to the company standard.
  • Able to meet the company standard on a daily work routine.
  • FedEx Supply Chain.

Warehouse Worker.

Location – Elgin IL United States

Job Description

Selecting products accurately, and precisely to the order of the customer.

Load and off load products onto delivery vehicles and pallets.

Also, pulling and offloading products for shipments.

Ensure the exact number of products and the type of product is loaded and shipped.

Furthermore, ensure picking and packing duties in an efficient manner.

Salary Est – $29,000 – $37,000

Warehouse Associate Full-Time.

Levi Strauss & Co.
Location – Henderson Nevada United States.

Job Description.

  • Work with the team to ensure efficient service delivery.
  • Arrange items for pickup.
  • Ensure products are correct and not damaged.
  • Check for proper packing before loading of products.
  • Pulling and loading trucks for shipments.
  • Salary Est – $17.50 per hour.

Warehouse Jobs in USA

Warehouse Associate
Location – Pine Bluff, Arkansas.

Job Description.

  • Responsible for the completeness and selection of correct orders in various functions.
  • Ensure to pick up customers’ orders for shipment.
  • Also, make sure the correct number and exact product is loaded for shipment.
  • Order responsibility applies depending on your work department.
  • Salary Est – $11 per hour
  • United Parcel Service
  • Location – Buford, Georgia United States of America (USA).

Job Description.

  • Using a hand cart to pick orders for your customers.
  • Use modern technology to fulfil orders.
  • Working with the logistics industry.
  • This is a good place to find jobs in the USA and other top Europe countries.

Benefits.

  • Team environment Orientation
  • Also, a full benefit package including 401 (k)
  • Benefit-eligible after 1 month
  • More advancement opportunities

Salary Est – $30,000 – $40,000.

Warehouse Handler Materials

  • Nestle USA.
  • Location – Anderson Indiana, United States..

Job Description.

  • Ensure to maintain first In, first Out practices.
  • Responsible for handling equipment properly. Therefore, preventing any equipment from damaging.
  • Follow the quality standards outline in the HACCP plan. Also, QMS, SOPs, and perform quality inspections too.
  • Furthermore, perform the sanitation of equipment and working area ( this includes disassembly and assembly of equipment).
  • Implement and ensure that you take proper follow-up when quality defects come up.
  • Work with your peer’s team and to make recommendations on how to improve basic operations.
  • Also, making sure you carry all duties and follow-up till completion.
  • Furthermore, observe daily routine safety checks of materials. Also, handling of equipment and work safety.
  • Always make sure inventory accuracy via cycle counting. More so, following proper SOPs
  • Learn to operate RF computer terminal with bar code scanner.
  • Working and understanding with company to hold programs. Furthermore, ensure to ship only clear and salable items.
  • Able to work in a cold environment of 36 degrees.
  • Load and offload trucks making use of a fork lift or pallet jack.
    select product in less than a pallet load quantity from the pickup area. Also, pass it to the order staging area.
  • Repetitive lifting of products and materials up to 50 lbs. throughout a 12hr shift time.
  • Unload Packaging with raw materials according to inbound dock schedule. Also, with production schedule.
  • Ensure accurate receive inbound product in SAP. More so, put away items into proper storage type areas.
  • Make sure to offload Sugar and Resin railcars and tanker trucks.

Educational Requirement.

  • High School Diploma or GED

Warehouse Job Skill Requirement

  • Genuine interest and willingness to participate and support a positive Nestle culture and adhere to lay down values.
  • Proactive individual who will take responsibility for any equipment, line, coworkers and the consistent improvement of the operation.
  • Also, able to work with an environmental team with honest communication. A person with a positive attitude, engagement, and trustworthiness.
  • Able to work off-shifts, with little or no supervision on weekends & extended shifts.
  • A highly sensible individual who can work with computers (navigating systems and recording information, etc.)
  • Must possess positive conflict management skills.
  • Precisely, most can work independently and with less supervision.
  • Responsible for personal development and improvement.
  • Pose the ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle different tasks.
  • Be able to obtain any licenses or certificates the company needs either by Nestle or outside regulatory agencies.
  • Either local, State or Federal.
  • Having a two-year working experience.

Salary Est – 50,859 – $64,000 per year
